name: The True Tales of Bloodstreet 13 - Chapter 1
description: Replay the crime scene from multiple perspectives as you follow detective Deacon Darnell in this mysterious case! A die-hard social puzzle game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 or newer Processor: i3 @ 2.0 GHZ or AMD equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 supported dedicated graphics card with atleast 2 GB VRAM. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 550 MB available space Sound Card: -
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 or newer Processor: i5 @ 3.00 GHz or AMD equivalent. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 supported dedicated graphics card with atleast 2 GB VRAM. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: -
